section.heading: Payment of costs and expenses.
section.text: Costs and expenses of all proceedings held under this chapter shall be paid as follows:

para.text: To expert witnesses designated by the Court, an amount determined by the Court;
To attorneys appointed under this chapter, fees as authorized under the Criminal Justice Act (§ 11-2601 et seq.);
To other witnesses, the same fees and mileage as for attendance at Court to be paid upon the approval of the Court.
